title: Is there a way to dictate what slot items will go into when you buy them?
body:
I'm not sure if I'm just oblivious to a very simple solution to this question, but I was wondering whether or not there was some way to make it so that when, for example, I buy a health pot, that it will go into the number 5 item slot automatically instead of having to move it there myself. 

Any assistance would be great! :)

replies.body:
This feature is not implemented into the game. An item will always go to the lowest available item slot.

Have you posted this into player creations?
